name: Super Mario Fan Game
description:
This is my second game, on this occasion of Super Mario Bro (Nes).

**

 REQUIREMENTS

OpenGL ES 3.0 compatible hardware

Some users have reported that in Windows the files can be taken as a virus.

**

Controls

Movement
W, A, S, D
Arrows: Up, Left, Down and Right

Pause
P

Survive one minute and defeat bowser.

Assets:

BGM and SFX

https://themushroomkingdom.net/media/smb/wav

Sprites:

https://www.spriters-resource.com/nes/supermariobros/
